name: Pushbot
description:
Pushbot is an action/puzzle? game created for Curdle Jam 30. This jam's theme was "rolling with the punches", and as you might expect, this game involves rolling objects being punched... or rather, pushed.

Controls

Joypad controls listed below assume an Xbox-style controller.

  • Up and Down (arrows, d-pad) to move character
  • 'A' key/A button - Weak Push
  • 'S' key/B button - Strong Push
  • 'D' key/X button - Toggle Holding Chamber
  • Enter key/Start button - Start
  • Escape key/Back button - Back

F11 key toggles fullscreen mode, but no attempt is made to match the aspect ratio or provide integer scaling.

Credits
  • Programming and Graphics – freem
    • External Assets
    • "Pushbot" logotype uses "Downlink" typeface by Pixel Sagas
    • Sounds generated in sfxr
    Game Engine

    LÖVE (a.k.a. "love2d")

    Code Libraries Used
    • baton by tesselode
    • tick by bjornbytes
    • lume by rxi
